00052 DomainBase *TREX::europa::details::trex_domain(EUROPA::Domain const &dom) {
00053   EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type(dom.getDataType());
00054   std::auto_ptr<DomainBase> result;
00055   
00056   // Hard coded approach for now
00057   if( type->isBool() ) {
00058     // boolean 
00059     if( dom.isSingleton() )
00060       result.reset(new BooleanDomain(dom.getSingletonValue()==0.0));
00061     else 
00062       result.reset(new BooleanDomain());
00063   } else if( type->isNumeric() ) {
00064     EUROPA::edouble e_lb, e_ub;
00065     
00066     dom.getBounds(e_lb, e_ub);
00067     if( 1.0==type->minDelta() ) {
00068       EUROPA::eint i_lb(e_lb), i_ub(e_ub);
00069       IntegerDomain::bound t_lb = IntegerDomain::minus_inf,
00070        t_ub = IntegerDomain::plus_inf;
00071 
00072       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::minus_infinity()<i_lb )
00073        t_lb = EUROPA::cast_basis(i_lb);
00074       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::eint>::infinity()>i_ub )
00075        t_ub = EUROPA::cast_basis(i_ub);
00076       result.reset(new IntegerDomain(t_lb, t_ub));
00077     } else {
00078       FloatDomain::bound t_lb = FloatDomain::minus_inf,
00079        t_ub = FloatDomain::plus_inf;
00080 
00081       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::edouble>::minus_infinity()<e_lb )
00082        t_lb = EUROPA::cast_basis(e_lb);
00083       if( std::numeric_limits<EUROPA::edouble>::infinity()>e_ub )
00084        t_ub = EUROPA::cast_basis(e_ub);
00085       result.reset(new FloatDomain(t_lb, t_ub));
00086     }
00087   } else if( type->isString() ) {
00088     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00089     StringDomain tmp;
00090     
00091     dom.getValues(values);
00092     for(std::list<EUROPA::edouble>::const_iterator i=values.begin();
00093        values.end()!=i; ++i) 
00094       tmp.add(type->toString(*i));
00095     result.reset(tmp.copy());
00096   } else if( type->isEntity() ) {
00097     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00098     EuropaEntity tmp;
00099     
00100     dom.getValues(values);
00101     for(std::list<EUROPA::edouble>::const_iterator i=values.begin();
00102        values.end()!=i; ++i) 
00103       tmp.add(type->toString(*i));
00104     result.reset(tmp.copy());
00105   } else if( type->isSymbolic() ) {
00106     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00107     TREX::transaction::EnumDomain tmp;
00108     
00109     dom.getValues(values);
00110     for(std::list<EUROPA::edouble>::const_iterator i=values.begin();
00111        values.end()!=i; ++i) 
00112       tmp.add(type->toString(*i));
00113     result.reset(tmp.copy());
00114   } else {
00115     throw EuropaException("Don't know how to convert europa type "+
00116                        type->getName().toString()+
00117                        " to an equivalent TREX doomain");
00118   }
00119   return result.release();
00120 }

00145 EUROPA::Domain *EuropaDomain::safe_copy(EUROPA::Domain *dom) {
00146   if( NULL!=dom ) 
00147     return dom->copy();
00148   return NULL;
00149 }

00153 EuropaDomain::EuropaDomain(EUROPA::Domain const &dom) 
00154   :DomainBase(type_name), m_dom(dom.copy()) {}
00155  
00156 EuropaDomain::EuropaDomain(EuropaDomain const &other) 
00157   :DomainBase(other), m_dom(safe_copy(other.m_dom)) {}
00158 
00159 EuropaDomain::~EuropaDomain() {
00160   if( NULL!=m_dom ) 
00161     delete m_dom;
00162 }

00166 bool EuropaDomain::isFull() const {
00167   EUROPA::DataTypeId const &type = europaDomain().getDataType();
00168   return type->baseDomain()==europaDomain();
00169 }

00171 boost::any EuropaDomain::singleton() const {
00172   std::auto_ptr<DomainBase> tmp(copy());
00173   return tmp->getSingleton();  
00174 }

00176 std::string EuropaDomain::stringSingleton() const {
00177   std::auto_ptr<DomainBase> tmp(copy());
00178   return tmp->getStringSingleton();
00179 }

00181 bool EuropaDomain::intersect(DomainBase const &other) const {
00182   try {
00183     europa_domain visit(europaDomain().getDataType());
00184     other.accept(visit);
00185 
00186     return europaDomain().intersects(visit.domain());
00187   } catch(...) {
00188     return false;
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 bool EuropaDomain::equals(DomainBase const &other) const {
00193   try {
00194     europa_domain visit(europaDomain().getDataType());
00195     other.accept(visit);
00196 
00197     return europaDomain()==visit.domain();
00198   } catch(...) {
00199     return false;
00200   }
00201 }

00203 DomainBase *EuropaDomain::copy() const {
00204   // The EuropaDomain is just a proxy 
00205   // => convert the copy into a real TREX domain 
00206   return trex_domain(europaDomain());
00207 }

00210   std::auto_ptr<DomainBase> tmp(copy());
00211   return tmp->toXml(out, tabs);

00221 DomainBase &EuropaDomain::restrictWith(DomainBase const &other) {
00222   europa_domain visit(m_dom);
00223   other.accept(visit);
00224   return *this;
00225 }

00231 // callbacks
00232 
00233 void europa_domain::visit(BasicEnumerated const *dom) {
00234   if( m_dom->isEnumerated() ) {
00235     std::list<EUROPA::edouble> values;
00236     
00237     for(size_t i=0; i<dom->getSize(); ++i) {
00238       EUROPA::edouble val = m_type->createValue(dom->getStringValue(i));
00239 
00240       if( m_dom->isMember(val) )
00241        values.push_back(val);
00242     }
00243     if( values.empty() )
00244       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA enumerated domain "+m_dom->toString()+"became empty.");
00245     m_dom->empty();
00246     m_dom->insert(values);
00247   } else 
00248     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "EUROPA domain is not enumerated.");
00249 }
00250 
00251 void europa_domain::visit(BasicInterval const *dom) {
00252   if( m_dom->isInterval() ) {
00253     std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::Domain> tmp(m_dom->copy());
00254     std::string lo = dom->getStringLower(), hi = dom->getStringUpper();
00255 
00256 
00257     debugMsg("trex:assign", "Attempting to intersect "<<m_dom->toString()
00258             <<" with ["<<lo<<", "<<hi<<"]");
00259     EUROPA::edouble elo = m_type->createValue(lo), ehi = m_type->createValue(hi);
00260     debugMsg("trex:assign", "  - converted ["<<lo<<", "<<hi
00261             <<"] into europa "<<m_type->getNameString()<<" ["<<elo<<", "<<ehi<<"]");
00262     tmp->intersect(elo, ehi);
00263     debugMsg("trex:assign", "  - intersection is "<<tmp->toString());
00264     if( tmp->isEmpty() )
00265       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA interval domain "+m_dom->toString()+" became empty.");
00266     m_dom->intersect(*tmp);
00267   } else 
00268     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "EUROPA domain is not an interval.");
00269 }
00270 
00271 void europa_domain::visit(DomainBase const *dom, bool) {
00272   Symbol const &type = dom->getTypeName();
00273   
00274   if( EuropaDomain::type_name==type ) {
00275     EuropaDomain const &dd = dynamic_cast<EuropaDomain const &>(*dom);
00276     
00277     if( !m_dom->intersect(dd.europaDomain()) )
00278       throw EmptyDomain(*dom, "EUROPA domain "+m_dom->toString()+" became empty.");
00279   } else 
00280     throw DomainAccess(*dom, "Don't know how to convert domain "
00281                      +type.str()+" for EUROPA");
00282 }
